content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://unified-data-cluster@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE GLOVIA_PROD.JE_DET (	[JE_CCN] varchar(8000),
	[JE] varchar(8000),
	[JE_SUB] varchar(8000),
	[JE_LINE] varchar(8000),
	[GL_ACCT] varchar(8000),
	[CCN] varchar(8000),
	[ASOF_DATE] datetime2(7),
	[PCT] numeric(38,18),
	[QTY] numeric(38,18),
	[REF] varchar(8000),
	[SU] varchar(8000),
	[ASOF_YEAR] varchar(8000),
	[REVERSE_YEAR] varchar(8000),
	[MEMO] varchar(8000),
	[OVT] varchar(8000),
	[PA_COST_FLAG] varchar(8000),
	[PROJECT_ID] varchar(8000),
	[TASK_ID] varchar(8000),
	[GL_SL] varchar(8000),
	[GL_DL] varchar(8000),
	[DEBIT_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[CREDIT_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_ALPHA1] varchar(8000),
	[USER_ALPHA2] varchar(8000),
	[USER_ALPHA3] varchar(8000),
	[USER_NUM1] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_NUM2] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_NUM3] numeric(38,18),
	[USER_DATE] datetime2(7),
	[USER_TIME] varchar(8000),
	[BANK] varchar(8000),
	[REF_SEQ] varchar(8000),
	[VAT] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'GLOVIA_PROD/JE_DET/JE_DET.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [unified-data-cluster_modineerlake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM GLOVIA_PROD.JE_DET
GO
